Text: Vacation RequestLavorato Hello Below are estimates on the vacation we discussed last week I know that Jamaica was not a set destination but I really feel something like the FDR Resort might be a good options for a family vacation One of the biggest pluses is the nanny you are assigned upon arrival I think most people find it really makes the vacation stress fee I will be honest with you there are other resorts in the Caribbean that are nicer but they are not family resorts Programs and things are offered for children usually starting at years sometimes of age nanny services are not really provide and just babysitting that must be prearranged If features like the nanny service are not as important to you then I will make other suggestions I am not including rates on the Boscobel Beach Resort because they just closed to do renovation that will last until December If you have any questions need additional information or would like to set up reservations please do not hesitate to call or Email Regards Crystal Schwartz ESTIMATES BELOW ARE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY AND PRICE CHANGE UNTIL CONFIRMED WITH PAYMENTS NEEDED ROUNDTRIP AIRFARE ON AMERICAN AIRLINES CONNECTIONS IN MIAMI PER ADULT CHILD FARE RATE IS SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY AND PRICE CHANGE UNTIL CONFIRMED WITH PAYMENTS NEEDED I HAVE BASED THE RATES ABOVE ON DEPARTURE FEBRUARY FEBRUARY PLEASE WHAT YOU WOULD PREFER AND I WILL CHECK FOR SEATING ROUNDTRIP AIRFARE ON CONTINENTAL AIRLINES CONNECTIONS IN TAMPA PER ADULT CHILD FARE SAME NOTES AND DATES AS ABOVE FDR RESORT PLEASE TAKE A LOOK AT THIS WEB SITE IF YOU HAVE TIME WWWWHERESTAYCOM THEY HAVE PICTURE AND COMMENTS FROM CLIENTS WHO HAVE STAYED THERE IN THE PAST YEAR ONE BEDROOM SUITE WITH NANNY FOR NIGHTS TWO BEDROOM SUITE WITH NANNY FOR NIGHTS Vitol Travel Services Louisiana Suite Houston Texas Phone Fax Do You Yahoo Yahoo Shopping Thousands of Stores Millions of Products

Receipt for your recordsAGENT CSCS BOOKING REF YCIEEN SCHWIEGERJAMES ENRON SMITH HOUSTON TX JAMES SCHWIEGER EXT DATE MAY PERSONAL MISCELLANEOUS JUL GRENADA SUN WINDJAMMER SINGLE CRUISE FARE STOWAWAY NIGHT PORT CHARGES CANCELLATION INSURANCE DEPOSIT RECEIVED FINAL PAYMENT RECEIVED INVOICE TOTAL PAYMENT CA BOAT YANKEE CLIPPER DEPARTURE FROM GRENADA JULY STOWAWAY NIGHT JULY LENGTH OF CRUISE NIGHTS DAYS RATE INCLUDES ACCOMMODATIONS ON BOARD THE YANKEE CLIPPER IN A SINGLE CAPTAINS CABIN MEALS ON BOARD THE SHIP WINE WITH DINNER PORT TAXES CANCELLATION INSURANCE STOWAWAY NIGHT IF YOU CANCEL FOR A REASON NOT COVERED BY THE INSURANCE THE FOLLOWING PENALTIES WILL APPLY CANCELLATION PENALTIES AT BOOKING INSURANCE COST IS PLUS BOOKING FEE DAYS DAYS PRIOR TO DEPARTURE YOU WILL BE PRESENTED WITH A GIFT CERTIFICATE TO APPLY TOWARDS A FUTURE BOOKING DAYS NONREFUNDABLE NO CREDITS NO CHANGES US CITIZENS ARE REQUIRED TO CARRY A VALID PASSPORT Vitol Travel Services Louisiana Suite Houston Texas Phone Fax Do You Yahoo Yahoo Auctions buy the things you want at great prices

ReceiptAGENT CSCS BOOKING REF ZHJOP SCHWIEGERJAMES ENRON SMITH HOUSTON TX JAMES SCHWIEGER EXT DATE MAY PERSONAL MISCELLANEOUS AUG COPENHAGEN THU HOLLAND AMERICA CRUISE FARE PORT CHARGES CRUISE PROTECTION DEPOSIT RECEIVED FINAL PAYMENT RECEIVED INVOICE TOTAL PAYMENT CA CRUISE LINE HOLLAND AMERICA CRUISE SHIP NOORDAM DEPARTURE DATE FROM COPENHAGAN AUGUST RETURN DATE FROM COPENHAGEN AUGUST CRUISE INTINERARY AUG COPENHAGAN AUG CRUISING THE BALTIC AUG TALLIN ESTONIA AUG ST PETERSBURG AUG ST PETERBURG AUG HELSINKI AUG STOCKHOLM AUG KALMAR AUG WARNEMUNDE AUG COPENHAGEN CRUISE INCLUDES ACCOMMODATIONS ON BOARD THE SHIP IN CATEGORY B CABIN NUMBER ALL MEALS ON BOARD THE SHIP NONALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES EXCLUDING SODAS NIGHTLY ENTERTAINMENT PORT TAXES CRUISE PROTECTION THE CRUISE PROTECTION WILL ALLOW YOU TO CANCEL THE CRUISE FOR ANY REASON UP TO HOURS PRIOR OT SAILING ND RECEIVE A PERCENT OF THE CRUISE FARE IN A CREDIT THIS CREDIT CAN BE APPLIED TOWARDS ANOTHER CRUISE WITH HOLLAND AMERICA VOID DATE WILL BE ON THE CERTIFICATE IF YOU CANCEL FOR A REASON NOT COVERED BY THE INSURANCE THEN YOUR FUNDS WILL BE REFUNDED TO YOU VALID PASSPORT IS NEEDED FOR TRAVEL VISAS ARE NEEDED IN SOME AREAS PLEASE CALL VIP SERVICES FOR ASSITANCE AT Vitol Travel Services Louisiana Suite Houston Texas Phone Fax Do You Yahoo Get personalized email addresses from Yahoo Mail only a year
